biotools.summary: Haplotype inference and phasing for Short Tandem Repeats (hipSTR) is a haplotype-based method for robustly genotyping and phasing STRs from Illumina sequencing data. It also enables genome-wide analysis and validation of de novo STR mutations.

bioschemas.name: hipSTR
bioschemas.summary: Haplotype inference and phasing for Short Tandem Repeats (hipSTR) is a haplotype-based method for robustly genotyping and phasing STRs from Illumina sequencing data. It also enables genome-wide analysis and validation of de novo STR mutations.
